title: Update FO-05 E2E test for summary feature
description:
Update the E2E test to verify the summary appears on the completion screen.

Files to modify:
- e2e/fo-05.test.ts

Add to Step 12 verification:
1. Wait for summary section to appear (look for 'Your Journey' heading or similar)
2. Verify summary contains non-empty text
3. Verify summary section is above the affirmation list

The test should:
- Not fail if summary takes a moment to load (add reasonable wait)
- Verify the summary is visible alongside the affirmation list
- Log what summary text was generated (for debugging)

Keep existing affirmation list verification intact.
acceptance_criteria: node --import tsx e2e/fo-05.test.ts passes; test output shows summary verification
